oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Opening day at Harpeth Hills Golf Course, Nashville, Tennessee, 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Mayor Briley presenting the official opening of Harpeth Hills Golf Course at Percy Warner Park in 1965. Harpeth Hills is widely respected as one of Tennessee’s top public golf facilities. This public golf course is located at 2424 Old Hickory Blvd. in Forest Hills, Tennessee near the Belle Meade area, approximately 12 miles southwest of downtown Nashville. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
